```{r}
setwd("/work/lotterhos/MVP-NonClinalAF")
```

```{r}
ran_mutpdf <- data.frame(seed = substr( system("ls sim_output_20220117/*_2muts.pdf", intern = TRUE), 21, 27), ran_mut = TRUE)
ran_pca <- data.frame(seed = substr( system("ls sim_output_20220117/*pcaProject", intern = TRUE), 21, 27), ran_pca = TRUE)
ran_simout <- data.frame(seed = substr( system("ls sim_output_20220117/*_Rout_simSummary.txt", intern = TRUE), 21, 27), ran_sim = TRUE)

status.df <- merge(sim.df1, ran_mutpdf, all.x=TRUE)
status.df <- merge(status.df, ran_pca, all.x=TRUE)
status.df <- merge(status.df, ran_simout, all.x=TRUE)

status.df <- cbind(status.df, status.df$seed)
```
